name: Dark Terrors
description:
This is a game I put together in less then 3 hours, completed at 2:54:30. Obviously it is not polished, or even good, but it definitely taught me that 3 hours isn't very much time in game development. It's lacking music and sound effects as my computer decided to betray me at that part of the development.

For gameplay you essentially point and click at the creatures before they get to the croweds of people. I made it insanely hard by adding waves and variable speeds at which the creatures run. Goodluck!
